short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workonomic (a time-tracking app with chat interface) extension for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the Workonomic extension for the Google Chrome browser. It lets you track your work-time, notes and more by using just natural language. 

With the extension, you can do all the things you would be able to do through our chat interface. But you don't need a Google/Gmail or FB account. You only need the workonomic API token which you get when you signup for Workonomic.

What is workonomic?

A personal Time Tracking utility you can use via Web, Google Hangouts chat, Facebook chat, Email ...

Who is it for?

It's made for freelancers and other professionals who want to track billable time, without wasting time to do so.

History:

0.0.4 - support for two way coomunication via websockets (i.e. the pinging works on chrome extension too now)
